column4: ok, I have feh, eog, and gthumb image viewers in gnome. Whenever I switch to gthumb or feh to be the default viewers in nautilus it won't remember the settings and new pngs displayed with eog when clicking on it
Also trying to remove eog in synaptic want to remove the whole ubuntu-desktop
ubuntu-desktop is a meta-package. it wont hurt to remove it
i just reorder the list so the one i like is on top (i think)
